definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
Chinese guillemet 《》(punct. used for names of books etc)

sentences.english: People who are perceived as experts have a greater ability to persuade others.
sentences.chinese: 被冠以专家名号的人物在说服他人方面确实技高一筹。

sentences.english: This building in New York's Columbus Circle is dubbed the 'lollipop' building for obvious reasons.
sentences.chinese: 这个建筑被冠以“棒棒糖”的名号是有原因的。

sentences.english: I will not pour out their libations of blood or take up their names on my lips.
sentences.chinese: 他们所浇奠的血我不献上，我嘴唇也不题别神的名号。

sentences.english: “SEA of peace” is the title China has bestowed on its adjacent oceans.
sentences.chinese: 中国给其周边海域冠以“和平之海”的名号。

sentences.english: Then, with the reputation and strength of Ming government, he monopolized the trades along the Southeastern coast.
sentences.chinese: 他借助明廷的名号和力量，垄断了东南沿海的贸易。

sentences.english: Let them be before the LORD continually, that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 愿这些罪常在耶和华面前，使他的名号断绝于世。

sentences.english: And Pilate wrote a title, and put it on the cross.
sentences.chinese: 彼拉多又用牌子写了一个名号，安在十字架上。

sentences.english: Do not let its position fool you, it is definitely worth a gander
sentences.chinese: 但是不要让它的名号唬住你，绝对值得一看。

sentences.english: The village appellation of Margaux in the Médoc is surely one of the best known in the world.
sentences.chinese: 梅多克玛歌产区是世界最知名的名号之一。

sentences.english: Do not let its position fool you, it is definitely worth a gander.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要让它的名号唬住你，绝对值得一看。

sentences.english: The Revolution has essentially become a revolution in name only.
sentences.chinese: 这次革命本质上就是一个名号而已。

sentences.english: May their sins always remain before the Lord , that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 愿这些罪常在耶和华面前，使他的名号断绝于世。

sentences.english: Who hear the Name of Amitabha Buddha .
Working "dead hard" is just like joining this session to recite the Bodhisattva's name.
sentences.chinese: 死工夫，就是譬如今天的打七念菩萨名号。

definition: famous name/your distinguished name/one's formal personal name
Daming county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei
lit. like thunder piercing the ear/a well-known reputation (idiom)
